content:
In Kryvyi Rih on Tuesday evening, an explosion during the announced air anxiety.

About thisreportedHead of Dnipropetrovsk Ova Sergey Lisak.

The enemy attack occurred in a high -rise building.

“We clarify all the information. The threat is ongoing. There is air alarm in the area. Be safe, ”Sergei Lisak wrote.

Earlier, the air forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine were warned about the launch of the Russians of the managed aviation missile, probably X-59, in the direction of Kryvyi Rih.
title: In Kryvyi Rih as a result of rocket attack of the Russian Federation, a multi -storey man lit up
description: This was reported by the head of Dnipropetrovsk Ova Sergey Lisak. As a result of an enemy attack ...
author: Army Inform
